data.lyric:
[ti:Good Old Days]
[ar:Macklemore/Kesha]
[al:GEMINI]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]Good Old Days (美好的往日) - Macklemore (麦可莫)/Kesha (凯莎)
[00:01.18]Kesha：
[00:01.72]
[00:16.15]I wish somebody would have told me babe
[00:18.90]
[00:20.08]Some day these will be the good old days
[00:23.18]All the love you won't forget
[00:26.53]And all these reckless nights you won't regret
[00:30.56]
[00:31.85]Someday soon your whole life's gonna change
[00:34.88]
[00:35.62]You'll miss the magic of these good old days
[00:39.09]Macklemore：
[00:39.34]I was thinking about the band
[00:41.01]I was thinking about the fans
[00:42.19]
[00:42.96]We were underground
[00:44.12]Loaded merch in that 12 passenger van
[00:46.74]In a small club in Minnesota
[00:48.66]And the snow outside of 1st Ave
[00:50.64]I just wanted my name in a star
[00:52.20]
[00:53.05]Now look at where we at
[00:54.27]Still growing up still growing up
[00:57.15]
[00:58.10]I would lay in my bed and dream about what I'd become
[01:00.96]
[01:01.96]Couldn't wait to get older couldn't wait to be some
[01:04.94]
[01:05.83]Now that I'm here wishing I was still young
[01:08.82]
[01:09.83]Those good old days
[01:10.55]Kesha：
[01:10.82]I wish somebody would have told me babe
[01:13.98]
[01:14.54]That some day these will be the good old days
[01:17.85]All the love you won't forget
[01:21.09]And all these reckless nights you won't regret
[01:24.81]
[01:26.32]'Cause someday soon your whole life's gonna change
[01:30.17]You'll miss the magic of the good old days
[01:33.56]Macklemore：
[01:33.84]Wish I didn't think I had the answers
[01:35.40]Wish I didn't drink all of that flask first
[01:37.27]
[01:37.93]Wish I made it to homecoming
[01:39.58]Got up the courage to ask her
[01:41.23]Wish I would've gotten out of my shell
[01:43.13]Wish I put the bottle back on that shelf
[01:44.99]Wish I wouldn't have worry about what other people thought
[01:46.85]And felt comfortable in myself
[01:48.52]
[01:49.06]Rooftop open and the stars above
[01:51.77]
[01:52.97]Moment frozen sneaking out and falling in love
[01:55.63]
[01:56.64]Me you and that futon we'd just begun
[01:59.42]
[02:00.81]On the grass dreaming figuring out who I was
[02:03.57]
[02:04.47]Those good old days
[02:05.21]Kesha：
[02:05.52]I wish somebody would have told me babe
[02:08.65]
[02:09.21]That some day these will be the good old days
[02:12.53]All the love you won't forget
[02:15.77]And all these reckless nights you won't regret
[02:19.30]
[02:20.93]'Cause someday soon your whole life's gonna change
[02:24.26]
[02:24.79]You'll miss the magic of the good old days
[02:28.34]Both：
[02:28.64]Never thought we'd get old maybe we're still young
[02:31.98]Maybe you always look back and think it was better than it was
[02:35.51]
[02:36.13]Maybe these are the moments
[02:37.90]Maybe I've been missing what it's about
[02:39.64]Been scared of the future thinking about the past
[02:41.98]While missing out on now
[02:43.47]We've come so far I guess I'm proud
[02:46.35]
[02:47.39]And I ain't worried about the wrinkles around my smile
[02:50.40]
[02:51.24]I've got some scars I've been around
[02:54.17]
[02:55.15]I've felt some pain I've seen some things but I'm here now
[02:58.17]
[02:59.03]Those good old days
[03:00.33]Kesha：
[03:00.72]
[03:01.86]You don't know what you've got
[03:07.39]
[03:09.56]Till it goes till it's gone
[03:14.71]
[03:17.36]You don't know what you've got
[03:23.06]
[03:25.18]Till it goes till it's gone
[03:30.18]
[03:31.24]I wish somebody would have told me babe
[03:34.02]
[03:35.25]Some day these will be the good old days
[03:38.50]All the love you won't forget
[03:41.65]And all these reckless nights you won't regret
[03:45.81]
[03:47.00]Someday soon your whole life's gonna change
[03:50.07]
[03:50.75]You'll miss the magic of these good old days
data.trans:
[ti:Good Old Days]
[ar:Macklemore/Kesha]
[al:GEMINI]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]//
[00:01.18]//
[00:01.72]
[00:16.15]我希望有人可以早点告诉我
[00:18.90]
[00:20.08]有一天 这些美好时光都会成为回忆
[00:23.18]你不会忘记那些爱的记忆
[00:26.53]你不会为这些鲁莽的夜晚感到后悔
[00:30.56]
[00:31.85]有朝一日 你的整个人生都会改变
[00:34.88]
[00:35.62]你会想念这些美好时光带来的魔力
[00:39.09]//
[00:39.34]我想念我的乐队
[00:41.01]我想念我的乐迷
[00:42.19]
[00:42.96]我们曾经是地下歌手
[00:44.12]十二人的客车就是我们的落脚之处
[00:46.74]在明尼苏达州一个小小的夜店里表演
[00:48.66]外面大雪纷飞 第一大道被大雪掩埋
[00:50.64]我只想名声大噪
[00:52.20]
[00:53.05]现在 看看我们身在何处
[00:54.27]我们还在成长 还在成长
[00:57.15]
[00:58.10]我会躺在床上 梦想自己将来的模样
[01:00.96]
[01:01.96]我迫不及待想要长大 成为梦想中的偶像
[01:04.94]
[01:05.83]如今 我希望自己仍然年少
[01:08.82]
[01:09.83]回想曾经那些美好时光
[01:10.55]//
[01:10.82]我希望有人可以早点告诉我
[01:13.98]
[01:14.54]有一天 这些美好时光都会成为回忆
[01:17.85]你不会忘记那些爱的记忆
[01:21.09]你不会为这些鲁莽的夜晚感到后悔
[01:24.81]
[01:26.32]因为有朝一日 你的整个人生都会改变
[01:30.17]你会想念美好时光带来的魔力
[01:33.56]//
[01:33.84]多希望我可以无忧无虑
[01:35.40]多希望我不会沉浸在灯红酒绿里
[01:37.27]
[01:37.93]多希望我可以荣归故里
[01:39.58]鼓起勇气 向她表白
[01:41.23]多希望我可以摆脱一切束缚
[01:43.13]多希望我可以拒绝诱惑
[01:44.99]多希望我不用在乎他人的想法
[01:46.85]让自己感觉无拘无束
[01:48.52]
[01:49.06]躺在屋顶 看着满天繁星璀璨闪耀
[01:51.77]
[01:52.97]时间定格在那一瞬间 溜出家门 放肆去爱
[01:55.63]
[01:56.64]我们在沙发上耳语呢喃 如胶似漆
[01:59.42]
[02:00.81]躺在草地上 梦见过去的自己
[02:03.57]
[02:04.47]回想曾经那些美好时光
[02:05.21]//
[02:05.52]我希望有人可以早点告诉我
[02:08.65]
[02:09.21]有一天 这些美好时光都会成为回忆
[02:12.53]你不会忘记那些爱的记忆
[02:15.77]你不会为这些鲁莽的夜晚感到后悔
[02:19.30]
[02:20.93]因为有朝一日 你的整个人生都会改变
[02:24.26]
[02:24.79]你会想念美好时光带来的魔力
[02:28.34]//
[02:28.64]从未想到我们会日渐衰老 也许我们仍然青春年少
[02:31.98]也许我们总会回顾过去 认为此刻比过去幸福
[02:35.51]
[02:36.13]也许在这些瞬间
[02:37.90]也许我一直在想念过去
[02:39.64]沉浸在回忆里 不敢面对未来
[02:41.98]如今 当内心的思念喷涌而出
[02:43.47]我们已经走得太远 我想我会心怀骄傲
[02:46.35]
[02:47.39]我不再担心岁月在我脸上留下的痕迹
[02:50.40]
[02:51.24]我曾伤痕累累 也曾踌躇犹豫
[02:54.17]
[02:55.15]抛去那些伤痛 我增长了一些见识 但是如今我在这里
[02:58.17]
[02:59.03]回想曾经那些美好时光
[03:00.33]//
[03:00.72]
[03:01.86]你不知道自己得到了什么
[03:07.39]
[03:09.56]直到你拥有的一切全都逝去
[03:14.71]
[03:17.36]你不知道自己得到了什么
[03:23.06]
[03:25.18]直到你拥有的一切全都逝去
[03:30.18]
[03:31.24]我希望有人可以早点告诉我
[03:34.02]
[03:35.25]有一天 这些美好时光都会成为回忆
[03:38.50]你不会忘记那些爱的记忆
[03:41.65]你不会为这些鲁莽的夜晚感到后悔
[03:45.81]
[03:47.00]有朝一日 你的整个人生都会改变
[03:50.07]
[03:50.75]你会想念这些美好时光带来的魔力
